title: (x) Transcona Optical - Motter Ombra {Mark Simonson}
content:
Well, look at this... Now it's my turn to ask for help. The name of this face is stuck in the back of my cranium somewhere and I can't seem to pry it out. I'm pretty sure it's an old Letraset or Mecanorma face, but unfortunately I don't have my catalogues in front of me for reference. I know I'm going to kick myself for not knowing this one off the top of my head.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141100im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/18954.gif)   
   
Thanks all.
author: grant

comments.content: Motter Ombra. It used to be in Letraset's Letragraphica Series.

Mark, you're a peach.   
   
I though that it may have been one of Othmar's children. I had Tektura, Femina and Sparta checked off but couldn't remember any other names. And I managed to find it in my Letraset catalogue right before checking the board again. Thanks.
